dateaccessioned.description: date the item was acquired or added to Koha

replacementprice.description: cost the library charges to replace the item if it has been marked lost

replacementpricedate.description: the date the price is effective from

datelastborrowed.description: the date the item was last checked out/issued

datelastseen.description: the date the item was last see (usually the last time the barcode was scanned or inventory was done)

notforloan.description: authorized value defining why this item is not for loan

damaged.description: authorized value defining this item as damaged

itemlost.description: authorized value defining this item as lost

itemlost_on.description: the date and time an item was last marked as lost, NULL if not lost

withdrawn.description: authorized value defining this item as withdrawn

withdrawn_on.description: the date and time an item was last marked as withdrawn, NULL if not withdrawn

issues.description: number of times this item has been checked out/issued

renewals.description: number of times this item has been renewed

reserves.description: number of times this item has been placed on hold/reserved

restricted.description: authorized value defining use restrictions for this item

holdingbranch.description: library that is currently in possession item

timestamp.description: date and time this item was last altered

location.description: authorized value for the shelving location for this item

permanent_location.description: linked to the CART and PROC temporary locations feature, stores the permanent shelving location

onloan.description: defines if item is checked out (NULL for not checked out, and checkout date for checked out)

cn_source.description: classification source used on this item

ccode.description: authorized value for the collection code associated with this item

itype.description: itemtype defining the type for this item
